name: Robot Champions
description:
An Online arcade Robot Fighting game by Prospect. Jump in the arena and get ready to smash, bash, rip and tear!

Robot Champions includes:
- A massive range of singleplayer features including challenges, tournaments and a story mode
- Local and Online Multiplayer for up to six players. Create custom games, enter online tournaments and rank up!
- Thousands of robot permutations: skins, antennas and more!

We plan to support Robot Champions long after launch with expanded game modes, builder tools and of course new robots!
